text: thumb|Kenneth Grange in October 2016 with an InterCity 125 power car, the nose cone for which he designed in the 1970s. Sir Kenneth Henry Grange (17 July 1929 â€“ 21 July 2024) was a British industrial designer, renowned for a wide range of designs for familiar, everyday objects. He died on 21 July 2024, four days after his 95th birthday. Category:1929 births Category:2024 deaths
title: Kenneth Grange
